projectInfo.description: Typing Speed Test Game is an interactive web application built with pure Vanilla JavaScript. The game challenges players to type technical words within a time limit based on the selected difficulty level. It features three difficulty levels (Easy, Normal, Hard), a countdown timer system, score tracking, and a beautiful modern UI with smooth animations. The project demonstrates expertise in vanilla JavaScript, DOM manipulation, event handling, and responsive web design.
projectFeatures: Three difficulty levels (Easy: 13s, Normal: 10s, Hard: 8s per word)
Interactive countdown timer for each word
Random word generation from technical words array
Paste protection to ensure test accuracy
Game over detection when time runs out
Responsive design for all screen sizes
Auto-focus on input field for better UX
Word removal from array after display
projectTechnologies: CSS3 (Modern styling, Flexbox, CSS Variables, Animations, Transitions)
Vanilla JavaScript (ES6+, DOM manipulation, Event handling, Timer functions)
Box Shadow & Border Radius (Modern UI styling)
projectStructure: ├── index.html              # Main HTML file with game structure
│   ├── master.css         # Main stylesheet with all game styles
│   └── master.js          # Main JavaScript file with game logic
│       └── startPlay()    # Game timer and logic function
projectStrategies: Pure Vanilla JavaScript for zero dependencies and fast performance
DOM manipulation for dynamic content updates
Event-driven architecture with click and input events
Array manipulation for word management (splice, random selection)
Case-insensitive string comparison for user input
Responsive design with Flexbox and percentage-based layouts
CSS Variables for easy theming and color management
Paste event prevention for test integrity
Auto-focus management for better user experience
State management through DOM element updates
Clean separation of concerns (HTML structure, CSS styling, JS logic)
performanceOptimizations: Lightweight codebase with no external dependencies
CSS animations instead of JavaScript animations
Clean interval clearing to prevent memory leaks
securityFeatures: Paste event prevention to ensure test accuracy
No external API calls or data transmission
uiUxFeatures: Visual feedback for game states (Game Over, Congratulations)
